short_summary: maintains cableway and hydrometric gauging stations across approximately 500 sites in the Pacific and Yukon areas
description: Cableway Upgrades and Repairs at Telkwa River below Tsai Creek  Conduct construction activities to upgrade the existing cableway to a level of safety acceptable for personnel operation at the Water Survey of Canada Station at Telkwa River below Tsai Creek requires a Contractor to conduct construction activities to upgrade the existing cableway to a level of safety acceptable for personnel operation at the Water Survey of Canada Station at Telkwa River below Tsai Creek
